meanings.definition: Occurring or published after the death of the author.
meanings.sent1: The posthumous book was released to honor the writer's memory.
meanings.sent2: The posthumous novel became a bestseller after the author passed away.
meanings.sent3: It was a bittersweet moment when the posthumous work received critical acclaim.
meanings.sent4: The posthumous collection of poems echoed the author's profound thoughts from beyond the grave.
meanings.sent5: The posthumous tribute captured the essence of the writer's legacy.
